item.title: 肯尼亚将加强对社交媒体的控制以应对反鲁托的反弹
item.description: 在主要针对威廉-鲁托总统的恶性网络攻击中，肯尼亚计划加强对社交媒体的监管，因为对其压制不同政见的批评越来越多。【原文：Kenya plans to reinforce policing of social media amid a vicious online onslaught chiefly targeting President William Ruto, as criticism mounts of its efforts to stifle dissent.】

item.title: 香港中资股迎来三个月来最佳一周
item.description: 随着外部紧张局势出现缓和迹象以及国内需求复苏，市场情绪有所改善，中国股市在本周创下三个多月以来的最佳表现。【原文：Chinese stocks had their best week in more than three months as sentiment improved following signs of easing external tensions and a recovery in domestic demand.】

item.title: 以色列-哈马斯达成停火协议后，加沙何去何从？
item.description: 经过 15 个月的战争，以色列和哈马斯宣布暂停敌对行动。最好的情况是，为期六周的停火没有期限，这将带来一系列新的挑战。【原文：After 15 months of war, Israel and Hamas have announced a pause in hostilities. In the best case, in which the six-week ceasefire becomes open-ended, it will bring a host of new challenges.】

item.title: 中国主动型基金未能抓住 2024 年市场反弹的机遇
item.description: 2024 年底，中国股市在最后时刻成功反弹，但对大多数主动型经理人来说，这还不足以缩小与被动型投资者的差距。【原文：Chinese stocks managed to pull off a last-minute rebound in late 2024 but for most active managers, it wasn’t enough to close the gap with passive investors.】

item.title: 法国财政部长称政府垮台影响经济增长
item.description: 新任财政部长埃里克-隆巴（Eric Lombard）表示，上个月法国政府的倒台使法国的产出减少了0.3个百分点，并使国家失去了急需的税收来修复预算。【原文：The toppling of France’s government last month has shaved 0.3 percentage points off output and deprived the state of much-needed tax revenue to repair the budget, according to new Finance Minister Eric Lombard.】

item.title: 石油交易商因 2.5 亿英镑北海贷款与阿布扎比酋长发生冲突
item.description: 一位因购买北海油井而声名鹊起的意大利石油交易商与阿布扎比的一位酋长就是否存在支持其疯狂购买的数亿英镑融资发生争执。【原文：An Italian oil trader, who rose to prominence after purchasing North Sea oil wells, and an Abu Dhabi sheikh are in dispute over the existence of hundreds of millions of pounds in financing that underpinned his buying spree.】

item.title: 英镑疲软提振出口商，富时 100 指数创历史新高
item.description: 周五，英国富时 100 指数（FTSE 100）创下历史新高，原因是该股指的国际风险敞口提振了出口商，并帮助其摆脱了削弱英镑、金边债券和国内股市的动荡局面。【原文：The UK’s FTSE 100 hit a record high Friday, as the equity index’s international exposure boosted exporters and helped it shake off the turmoil that has weakened the pound, gilts and domestic stocks.】

item.title: 印度风能正在崛起，以满足夜间清洁电力需求
item.description: 受全天候清洁能源需求增长的推动，2024 年印度的风电装机量达到七年来的新高。【原文：Wind power installations in India rose to a seven-year high in 2024, boosted by growing demand for round-the-clock clean energy.】

item.title: 加沙停战后胡塞武装发出暂停攻击红海船只的信号
item.description: 在以色列与哈马斯达成停火协议后，以也门为基地的胡塞武装发出信号，暂停其长达数月之久的对商船的袭击。【原文：The Yemen-based Houthis signaled a pause in their months-long attacks on commercial ships following a ceasefire deal between Israel and Hamas.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行为非洲回调中的毛里塔尼亚部门找到新买家
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）为其在毛里塔尼亚的子公司找到了新的买家，因为此前出售非洲业务的计划没有得到监管部门的批准。【原文：Societe Generale SA found a new buyer for its subsidiary in Mauritania after an earlier plan to sell the African business didn’t receive regulatory approval.】

item.title: 2025 年伊始，日本散户投资者纷纷涌入股市
item.description: 日本个人投资者迎来了今年的第一个交易周，抢购了九个月来最大量的日本股票。【原文：Individual Japanese investors welcomed the first trading week of the year by snapping up the largest amount of the nation’s stocks in nine months.】

item.title: 韩国失事客机的两个引擎中都发现了鸟类羽毛
item.description: 韩国调查人员在上月底失事的波音公司 737-800 型喷气式客机的两个发动机中发现了羽毛，这可能证明该飞机在紧急迫降前可能失去了电力供应，导致机上几乎所有人丧生。【原文：South Korean investigators found feathers in both engines of the Boeing Co. 737-800 jet involved in a crash late last month, pointing to possible evidence that the aircraft may have lost electrical power before an ill-fated emergency landing that killed almost everyone on board.】

item.title: PE 公司利用 Nedbank 为肯尼亚糖果制造商的股份寻找买家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，两家私募股权投资公司已聘请 Nedbank Group Ltd. 出售其在东非最大糖果生产商的股份，价值超过 1 亿美元。【原文：Two private equity firms have hired Nedbank Group Ltd. to sell their stakes in East Africa’s biggest candy maker, valued at more than $100 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦在购买黄金的同时出售美元以支持坚戈
item.description: 本周哈萨克斯坦货币创下历史新低后，哈萨克斯坦央行将开始出售美元，以反映监管机构从国内生产商购买黄金的情况。【原文：Kazakhstan’s central bank will start selling dollars in a way that mirrors the regulator’s gold purchases from domestic producers after the national currency hit a record low this week.】

item.title: 美国与挪威签署从北极发射卫星的协议
item.description: 美国和挪威签署了一项协议，允许从北欧国家位于北极的安多亚航天发射场发射美国卫星。【原文：The US and Norway signed a deal allowing the launch of American satellites from the Nordic country’s Andoya Spaceport in the Arctic.】

item.title: 首艘受制裁油轮停靠俄罗斯重要的太平洋港口
item.description: 在华盛顿对俄罗斯能源业实施的最严厉的一轮制裁中，一艘油轮成为第一艘停靠俄罗斯科兹米诺港的油轮，它正在那里装载一批原油。【原文：An oil tanker sanctioned in Washington’s harshest round of curbs against Russia’s energy industry has become the first such vessel to dock at the Russian port of Kozmino, where it’s loading a cargo of crude.】

item.title: 印度大使称印度若想参与竞争就必须削减关税
item.description: 即将离任的美国驻印度大使说，如果印度想在唐纳德-特朗普即将到来的对华贸易战中获胜，就 "毫无疑问 "需要削减其高额关税，以便与东南亚对商业更友好的竞争对手竞争。【原文：There’s “no question” India needs to cut its high tariffs in order to compete with more business-friendly rivals in Southeast Asia if it wants to win from Donald Trump’s looming trade war with China, the outgoing US ambassador to India said.】

item.title: 零售数据疲软再次打击信心，英镑下跌
item.description: 英国零售销售数据弱于预期，支持了英国央行降息以帮助提振衰退的经济增长，英镑因此暴跌。【原文：The pound tumbled after weaker-than-expected UK retail sales data bolstered the case for interest-rate cuts by the Bank of England to help boost failing economic growth.】

item.title: KKR 将投资中东数据公司，应对数字需求飙升
item.description: 随着能源丰富的中东地区成为全球基金的首选投资目的地，以及对数字基础设施的需求激增，KKR & Co.【原文：KKR & Co. is set to buy a stake in one of the Middle East’s largest data center firms as the energy-rich region emerges as a top investment destination for global funds and as demand for digital infrastructure skyrockets.】

item.title: 马来西亚寻求反倾销改革以遏制中国商品泛滥
item.description: 据一位高级贸易官员称，马来西亚计划在未来几周内加强已有三十年历史的反倾销立法，以打击来自中国等国家的大量廉价商品。【原文：Malaysia plans to strengthen three-decade old anti-dumping legislation in the coming weeks to clamp down on a deluge of cheap goods from countries like China, according to a high-ranking trade official.】

item.title: 据说万科已准备好支付人民币债券的现金
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Developer China Vanke Co., which has a record amount of debt coming due, told some creditors prior to turbulence in the company’s bonds and shares on Friday that it has prepared enough cash to repay a 2.95% yuan bond due Jan. 27, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国零售销售下滑，经济陷入困境
item.description: UK retail sales posted a surprise fall around last month’s crucial Christmas period in a fresh setback for the Labour government’s hopes of reviving economic growth.

item.title: 令里夫斯头疼的英镑和英国国债面临更多损失MLIV 脉搏
item.description: 根据彭博市场实时脉搏（Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse）的最新调查，陷入困境的英国政府将难以挽回投资者的信心，金边债券和英镑将扩大近期的跌幅。【原文：The embattled UK government will struggle to wrestle back the confidence of investors, with gilts and the pound set to extend their recent losses, according to the latest Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯托纳拉斯称应通过一系列削减继续宽松政策
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯说，"在欧洲央行理事会下一次会议上，应通过一系列降息措施继续放松货币政策"。【原文：Monetary policy easing should continue “with a series of interest-rate cuts at the next ECB Governing Council meetings,” European Central Bank Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras said.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦前总理伊姆兰-汗因腐败案被定罪
item.description: 巴基斯坦一家法院认定前总理伊姆兰-汗在任期间滥用职权，判处其有期徒刑。【原文：A Pakistani court handed former Prime Minister Imran Khan a prison sentence after finding him guilty of misusing power while in office.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 12 月零售销售意外下滑
一艘船掉头驶向俄罗斯 聚焦石油市场混乱局面
item.description: 在华盛顿对运载俄罗斯石油的油轮实施迄今为止最严厉的制裁一周后，托运人似乎已经开始迅速而隐蔽地重建中断的供应链。【原文：A week after Washington rolled out its harshest sanctions to date on tankers carrying Russian oil, shippers already appear to be moving quickly but stealthily to rebuild disrupted supply chains.】

item.title: 星巴克中国区主席将在需求和竞争疲软中退休
item.description: 星巴克中国区主席黄钰玲将于 1 月 24 日退休，把重振这家美国咖啡连锁店在竞争最激烈的市场之一的增长的任务留给了新一代领导人。【原文：Starbucks Corp.’s China chair Belinda Wong will retire Jan. 24, leaving the task of reviving the American coffee chain’s growth in one of the most-competitive markets to a new generation of leaders.】

item.title: 野村与 T. Rowe 携手提高 6% 国债收益率预期
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.）与 T. Rowe Price 一样，认为 10 年期国债收益率今年有可能升至 6%。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. is joining T. Rowe Price in seeing a chance of 10-year Treasury yields rising to 6% this year, making the call days before Donald Trump’s inauguration as the next US president.】

item.title: Vista 首次走出非洲，将银行业务扩展至法国
item.description: Vista 集团收购了法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）和法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）在非洲的分支机构，该集团正在向法国扩张，因为这家总部位于布基纳法索的贷款机构希望利用非洲与欧洲之间的贸易机会。【原文：Vista Group, which bought Societe Generale SA and BNP Paribas SA’s African units, is expanding to France as the Burkina Faso-based lender looks to tap into trade opportunities between Africa and Europe.】
